metadata.title: CVE-2024-36467 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An authenticated user with API access (e.g.: user with default User role),more specifically a user with access to the user.update API endpoint isenough to be able to add themselves to any group (e.g.: ZabbixAdministrators), except to groups that are disabled or having restrictedGUI access.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
